## Introduction

|   The onset of COVID-19 affected almost every sphere of work and leisure. We are interested in investigating the impact one's athletic identity may have on a person's overall well-being, particularly as the context of a global pandemic may have dramatically impacted one's experience of playing a sport/being an athlete.
